mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM sop_meeting_scheduling sms WHERE sms.is_delete=0 and sms.meeting_type='meetingType:2' AND sms.schedule_status='0' AND sms.apply_time <> #{applyTime}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM sop_meeting_scheduling sms WHERE sms.is_delete=0 and sms.meeting_type <> 'meetingType:2' AND sms.schedule_status='0' AND sms.apply_time <> #{applyTime}

select p.project_name,sm.id,sm.reserve_time_start,sm.meeting_type,sm.reserve_time_end,sm.project_id FROM sop_meeting_scheduling sm , sop_project p WHERE sm.project_id = p.id and p.is_delete=0 and sm.is_delete=0 AND sm.schedule_status=1 and p.create_uid = #{uid} and project_departId = #{projectDepartid} AND sm.reserve_time_start BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{startTime} , ' 00:00:00') ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endTime} , ' 23:59:59') ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )

select count(id) from ( select p.project_name,sm.id,sm.reserve_time_start,sm.meeting_type,sm.reserve_time_end,sm.project_id FROM sop_meeting_scheduling sm , sop_project p WHERE sm.project_id = p.id and p.is_delete=0 and sm.is_delete=0 AND sm.schedule_status=1 and p.create_uid = #{uid} and project_departId = #{projectDepartid} AND sm.reserve_time_start BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{startTime} , ' 00:00:00') ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endTime} , ' 23:59:59') ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ) b WHERE b.reserve_time_start BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{dayTime} , ' 00:00:00') ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{dayTime} , ' 23:59:59') ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) and b.meeting_type = #{meetingType}

select p.project_name ,sm.id ,sm.reserve_time_start , sm.meeting_type ,sm.reserve_time_end ,sm.project_id ,d.name FROM sop_meeting_scheduling sm , sop_project p, dict d WHERE sm.project_id = p.id and sm.meeting_type = d.dict_code AND sm.schedule_status=1 and p.is_delete=0 and sm.is_delete=0 and p.create_uid = #{uid} and project_departId = #{projectDepartid} AND sm.reserve_time_start BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{dateTime} , ' 00:00:00') ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{dateTime} , ' 23:59:59') ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )
